name: Cuco
description:
Cuco is a 2D puzzle with elements of a hardcore platformer.
The goal of each level is to activate pink squares in different ways. Use 3 different characters to solve puzzles and pass the game.
Cuco will help you have a good time and strain your brains!

Features:
• minimalist style
• complex puzzles
• hardcore platformer
• pleasant color palette
• excellent soundtrack

Good luck!
